ISSUE.TITLE: NameError: name 'total' is not defined
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: https://github.com/heartexlabs/label-studio/blob/6a05a3dce33cb2ca735da988477521ed22408cff/label_studio/data_import/uploader.py#L59 If number of files exceed the settings.TASKS_MAX_FILE_SIZE, this error will happen, clearly total variable is not defined here. Should we change it to `value` ?
